explains: adj. 课外的；工作之外的，婚姻之外的

sentences.en: Each child had participated in extracurricular activities at school.
sentences.cn: 每个孩子都参加了学校的课外活动。

sentences.en: Freedom to pursue extracurricular activities is totally unrestricted.
sentences.cn: 参加课外活动的自由完全不受限制。

sentences.en: There are more extracurricular activities in high school than in middle school.
sentences.cn: 高中的课外活动比初中多。
